message:
Title: Thoughts on a Philosophy 

Eyes seeking true meaning all round,
X-raying life beyond bounds.
Individuals shape their nests,
Seeking answers in inner quests.
Titans of thought arguing time,
Existence above the paradigm.
No nihilistic view can quell,
In every soul a story dwell.
Anchoring in personal belief,
Live the questions and find relief.
Issue your own decree,
Staring at life's mystery.
Moving beyond a simple prism,
Descends the path of existentialism.
